title: Fitness wins the game
creator_credit: Donald Carter, Gaumont-British Instructional and Exclusive Films
brief_description: Football, cricket, boxing, hurdling, throwing the discus, in fact any kind of sport requires hard training if one is to excel at them. This film shows both the actual sports, and how to train for them.
creator_credit_for_label: Donald Carter, Gaumont-British Instructional and Exclusive Films
